label: Counties Served
notes: Multiple counties listed where service coverage information is available. In cases where not available, the county of the provider's official address is used. County association may or may not reflect full-county service coverage.

label: City HQ
definition: City included in provider's contact address

label: Passenger Trips
notes: Includes NTD mode categories Motorbus (MB), Bus Rapid Transit (RB), Cable Car (CC), Commuter Bus (CB), Commuter Rail (CR), Heavy Rail (HR), Hybrid Rail (YR), Inclined Plane (IP), Jitney (JT), Light Rail (LR), Monorail/Automated  Guideway (MG), Streetcar Rail (SR), Trolleybus (TB).

label: On-Demand Passenger Trips
definition: 2018 Total Unlinked Passenger Trips, Demand Response
notes: Includes NTD mode categories Demand Response (DR) and Demand Response Taxi (DT).

label: Vehicles at Max Service
notes: Includes NTD mode categories Motorbus (MB), Bus Rapid Transit (RB), Cable Car (CC), Commuter Bus (CB), Commuter Rail (CR), Heavy Rail (HR), Hybrid Rail (YR), Inclined Plane (IP), Jitney (JT), Light Rail (LR), Monorail/Automated  Guideway (MG), Streetcar Rail (SR), Trolleybus (TB).

label: On-Demand Vehicles at Max Service
definition: 2018 Vehicles Operating at Maximum Service, Demand Response
notes: Includes NTD mode categories Demand Response (DR) and Demand Response Taxi (DT).

label: Fare Revenue
notes: Includes NTD mode categories Motorbus (MB), Bus Rapid Transit (RB), Cable Car (CC), Commuter Bus (CB), Commuter Rail (CR), Heavy Rail (HR), Hybrid Rail (YR), Inclined Plane (IP), Jitney (JT), Light Rail (LR), Monorail/Automated  Guideway (MG), Streetcar Rail (SR), Trolleybus (TB).

label: On-Demand Fare Revenue
definition: 2018 Total Passenger Fare Revenue, Demand Response
notes: Includes NTD mode categories Demand Response (DR) and Demand Response Taxi (DT).

label: GTFS Static Feed
definition: URL for most recent static General Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) feed

label: GTFS-rt Service Alerts
definition: URL for most recent service alerts component of real-time GTFS feed

label: GTFS-rt Trip Updates
definition: URL for most recent trip-updates component of real-time GTFS feed

label: GTFS-rt Vehicle Locations
definition: URL for most recent vehicle-locations component of real-time GTFS feed
